en.title: About me
en.heading: Hello!
paragraphs: Im Pablo, a software engineer specialized in software design and software architecture. My main focus is leading development projects as a Team Lead

I hold a Masters Degree in Project Management and certifications such as Scrum Master and Product Owner, which allows me to bridge technology and business, facilitating planning, prioritization, and execution in agile environments.

I also actively contribute to open source projects, collaborating on the design, evolution, and improvement of software solutions, engaging with technical communities and staying aligned with industry best practices
Im driven by continuous improvement and technological innovation . I constantly expand my knowledge in software architecture, development methodologies, and emerging industry trends.
If youd like to get in touch, feel free to email me at pabloperdomofalcon@gmail.com or connect with me on LinkedIn.
